#### 8. **ADD INDUSTRY KEYWORDS FOR ATS**

Your resume needs these terms to pass ATS screening:

**Modeling:**
- Polygon modeling, topology optimization, retopology
- Hard-surface modeling, organic modeling
- Modular asset creation, kit bashing
- LOD (Level of Detail) creation
- Poly count optimization

**Texturing:**
- PBR workflow (Physically Based Rendering)
- UV unwrapping, UV layout optimization
- Texture baking (normal maps, ambient occlusion, curvature)
- Tileable textures, texture atlasing
- Hand-painted textures, procedural textures

**Technical:**
- Game-ready assets, real-time rendering
- Performance optimization, draw call reduction
- Asset pipeline, version control (Git, Perforce)
- Naming conventions, file organization
- Cross-platform compatibility (PC, mobile, console)

**Soft Skills:**
- Collaboration, teamwork, communication
- Time management, deadline-driven
- Iterative design, feedback implementation
- Problem-solving, technical troubleshooting

#### 9. **CREATE A TWO-VERSION STRATEGY**

**Version 1: ATS-Optimized (Plain Text Resume)**
- Simple formatting, no graphics/columns
- Standard fonts (Arial, Calibri, Times New Roman)
- Clear section headers (EDUCATION, SKILLS, PROJECTS)
- Keyword-rich content
- .docx or .pdf format

**Version 2: Visual Portfolio Resume**
- Creative design (your current Canva version)
- Include thumbnail images of projects
- Infographic skill bars
- Color-coded sections
- Use for in-person interviews or portfolio submissions

**WHY:** Many Malaysian studios (Streamline, Lemon Sky, Passion Republic) use ATS. Your beautiful Canva resume might not parse correctly.

## Industry Insights: Malaysian Game Art Market

### What Studios Are Looking For (Fresh Grads)

#### **Streamline Studios** (AAA Outsourcing)
âœ… Strong fundamental skills (anatomy, perspective, composition)  
âœ… Clean topology and optimized models  
âœ… Experience with Unreal Engine or Unity  
âœ… Portfolio showing game-ready assets  
âŒ Won't accept resumes without portfolio links  

#### **Lemon Sky Studios** (Animation & Game Art)
âœ… Artistic eye for detail and composition  
âœ… Ability to match existing art styles  
âœ… Fast iteration based on feedback  
âœ… Substance Painter/Designer proficiency  

#### **Passion Republic** (Mobile Games)
âœ… Mobile optimization skills (low-poly, texture compression)  
âœ… Stylized art style experience  
âœ… Unity pipeline knowledge  
âœ… Understanding of mobile performance constraints  

### Fresh Grad Reality Check

**Salary Expectations (Malaysia, 2026):**
- Junior 3D Modeller: RM 2,500 - RM 3,500
- Junior Environment Artist: RM 2,800 - RM 4,000
- Junior Game Asset Artist: RM 2,500 - RM 3,800

**Competition:**
- 200+ fresh grad game art applicants per month in Klang Valley
- Studios receive 50-100 applications per junior position
- Only 5-10% get interviews
- Portfolio quality is THE deciding factor

**What Gets You Noticed:**
1. **Exceptional portfolio** (top 10% quality)
2. **Specialized skills** (Houdini, Substance Designer, ZBrush)
3. **Game jam participation** (shows passion + teamwork)
4. **Internship experience** (even unpaid)
5. **Active online presence** (ArtStation, Twitter, LinkedIn)

### Red Flags for Malaysian Studios

ğŸš© **No portfolio or broken links**  
ğŸš© **Generic "3D Artist" title** (not specialized)  
ğŸš© **Only school assignments** (no personal projects)  
ğŸš© **Outdated software** (Maya 2015, 3ds Max 2012)  
ğŸš© **Poor English communication** (especially for outsourcing studios)  
ğŸš© **Unrealistic salary expectations** (asking RM 5k+ as fresh grad)
